title: Week 13 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, Slush Factory - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/3
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a win in Week 13! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 13 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Cowboys vs Saints game, and Jason spins the Wheel of Shame during the “Fantasy Faceoff” segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 3rd, 2021.
  
 (03:00) - Thursday Night Recap: Cowboys at Saints
 (09:35) - NFL News
 (13:00) - FootClan Friday
 (15:20) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (15:40) - Eagles at Jets
 (22:30)  - Colts at Texans
 (26:55)  - Washington Football Team at Raiders
 (33:40)  - Jaguars at Rams
 (38:25)  - Ravens at Steelers
 (42:05)  - 49ers at Seahawks
 (47:35)  - Broncos at Chiefs
 (51:30)  - Patriots at Bills
 (56:30)  - Fantasy Faceoff & Wheel of Shame
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
